properties.description: Pipeline de Nestl√© Veterinarios para el cliente Gil Salinas

Copy files of any size from SharePoint  to Data Lake, including copy all files matching a startswith condition of a folder and files modified in the last x hours.

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault

properties.description: Generic pipeline to update power bi datasets

Copy files of any size from SharePoint  to Data Lake, including copy all files matching a startswith condition of a folder and files modified in the last x hours.

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault

Copy files of any size from DataLake to SharePoint

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault

body.value:
@json(
    concat(
        '{"fileName": "', pipeline().parameters.parFileName,
        '",',
        '"environment": "', pipeline().parameters.parEnvironment,
        '",',
        '"sourceFolder": "', pipeline().parameters.parAdlsSourceFolder,
        '",',
        '"siteURL": "', pipeline().parameters.parShpSiteUrl,
        '",',
        '"shpRelativeFolderPath": "', pipeline().parameters.parShpRelativeFolderPath,
        '",',
        '"sharepointClientId": "', activity('GetShpClientId').output.value,
        '",',
        '"sharepointClientSecret": "', activity('GetShpSecret').output.value,
        '",',
        '}'
    )
)
